DOC.brief_summary: Patients receive one injection incobotulinumtoxinA ( Xeomin ) placebo baseline . Thereafter , patient enter Open-Label Extension Period ( OLEX ) receive five injection session incobotulinumtoxinA ( Xeomin ) OLEX period .
DOC.brief_title: IncobotulinumtoxinA ( Xeomin ) Versus Placebo Treatment Blepharospasm
DOC.criteria: Main Male female pretreated outpatient age 18 80 year ( inclusive ) A clinical diagnosis bilateral blepharospasm ( BEB ) characterize spontaneous , spasmodic , intermittent persistent involuntary contraction orbicular oculi muscle A need injection Botulinum toxin ( define Jankovic Rating Scale ( JRS ) severity subscore > = 2 ) On stable dose medication ( ) use focal dystonia treatment ( e.g . anticholinergic benzodiazepine ) least 3 month prior expect throughout Main Period Source documentation last two consecutive injection session BOTOX® stable satisfactory therapeutic response directly prior trial entry At least 10 week must pass last injection BOTOX® BEB Baseline Main Atypical variant BEB cause inhibition levator palpebrae muscle Myotomy denervation surgery affect muscle ( e.g . peripheral denervation and/or spinal cord stimulation ) The previous two injection BOTOX® 50 Units per eye Hypersensitivity human serum albumin , sucrose , Botulinum toxin A Neuroleptic induce blepharospasm Diagnosis myasthenia gravis , LambertEaton syndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , significant neuromuscular disease might interfere trial Treatment Botulinum toxins indication BEB within 4 month prior Baseline trial
